data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Alwar access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Alwar, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 40,416 believers in Alwar, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Alwar, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Alwar, Rajasthan, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Khati (Muslim traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Khati (Muslim traditions) people know you.
Jesus, purify the 40,416 believers in the county of Alwar to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Alwar to agree with you and with one another.
Father, convict the 40,416 believers in Alwar to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
